title: SERP Snippet Preview Tool
description: Shows a preview of how a webpage will look in Google's search results. Enter your title tag, meta description, and URL to optimize your snippets for higher click-through rates.
previewDesc: How it will appear in search results
previewTitleDefault: Your Page Title Will Appear Here
previewDescDefault: Your meta description will appear here. Make it compelling to improve click-through rates from search results.
